eventsList.title: Buwan ng Wika 2025 Culmination
eventsList.excerpt: A snapshot of Frolicsome star for Language Month 2025 culmination.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: Buwan ng Wikang Pambansa 2025
eventsList.excerpt: Ika nga ni Jose Rizal "Ang hindi magmahal sa sariling wika ay daig pa ang malansang isda," isang patunay lamang na ang wika ay buhay kung patuloy itong minamahal at ginagamit ng buong mamamayan.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: Feast of Assumption
eventsList.excerpt: The Candelaria Institute of Technology of Cabadbaran, Inc. community celebrates the Feast of Assumption through a Holy Mass and a floral offering to our Mother Mary. The celebration continued with a special prayer inside the classroom. This Feast of Assumption is a celebration  of grace, love, and hope to all Christians.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: National Aptitude and Normative Test for Educators (NANTE)
eventsList.excerpt: In partnership of Carl Balita, Candelaria Institute of Technology of Cabadbaran, Inc. successfully conducted the National Aptitude and Normative Test for Educators (NANTE) to all our third year and fourth year college students. This initiative helps the students assess their learnings from their previous courses and prepares them in their future career.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: ğğ«ğğ©ğšğ«ğğğ§ğğ¬ğ¬ ğ’ğšğ¯ğğ¬ ğ‹ğ¢ğ¯ğğ¬
eventsList.excerpt: On August 13, 2025 at 9:00 AM, our Elementary, High School, and College students, together with faculty, staff, and administration, united for an Earthquake and Fire Drill led by the dedicated Bureau of Fire Protection personnel. Through unity, discipline, and readiness, we strengthen our safety and resilience â€” because in times of crisis, every second counts.
eventsList.author: CITCI SSC College Department

eventsList.title: HIV/AIDS and Early Pregnancy Awareness
eventsList.excerpt: The Candelaria Institute of Technology of Cabadbaran Inc. (CITCI) hosted a significant HIV/AIDS and Early Pregnancy Awareness Symposium for its first-year college students, featuring resource speakers from the City Health Office (CHO). Ms. Sharon Mae B. Villanueva,RN, City Population Officer-Designate and Adolescent Coordinator, and Ms. Aprilyn Claros,RMT, HIV Coordinator, shared their expertise on critical topics such as HIV/AIDS prevention, transmission, and treatment, as well as reproductive health.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: Adjustment Measures Program (AMP)
eventsList.excerpt: We at Candelaria Institute of Technology of Cabadbaran, Inc. (CITCI) extend our deepest gratitude to the Department of Labor and Employment (DOLE) Caraga, through the Adjustment Measures Program (AMP), for the generous grant of laptops, tablets, and air conditioning units.
eventsList.author: CITCI

eventsList.title: DBES Budget Hearing
eventsList.excerpt: We were honored to have Chairperson Most Rev. Cosme R. Almedilla,D.D. presiding, alongside DBES Superintendent Rev. Fr. Marlon A. Lacal, our dedicated School Directors, esteemed members of the Board of Trustees, DBES Officers, School Finance team, and all our school principals. Collaborative efforts for this year's DBES Schools Financial well - being.
eventsList.author: CITCI Academic Head

callToActionContent.heading: Ready to Join Our Community?
callToActionContent.description: We invite you to take the next step in providing your child with an exceptional Catholic education. Contact our Admissions Office to schedule a tour or apply today.
